original_text: Each day Jesus was teaching at the temple, and each evening he went out to spend the night on the hill called the Mount of Olives,
korean_text: 예수께서 낮에는 성전에서 가르치시고 밤에는 나가 감람원이라 하는 산에서 쉬시니

sentences.original_text: Each day Jesus was teaching at the temple
and each evening he went out
to spend the night on the hill
